[b]ABOUT THE GAME

Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor explores what happened in the land of Mordor as Sauron prepares his armies for The War of the Ring.

You are Talion, a Ranger of the Black Gate, keeping watch over Mordor which has remained undisturbed for ages. In the blink of an eye, everything is taken from you Ã¢â‚¬â€œ your friends, your family, and even your own life. Resurrected by a vengeful spirit, you must now embark on a relentless vendetta against those who have wronged you. Fight through Mordor and uncover the truth of the spirit that compels you, discover the origins of the Rings of Power, build your legend and ultimately confront the evil of Sauron in this new chronicle in Middle-earth.

FEATURES

Talion is resurrected by a powerful Wraith and he has reforged him as an undying spirit of vengeance
The Wraith is a mysterious spirit that possesses Talion. His motivations are unknown.
The Dark Lord Sauron claims Middle-earth as his rightful dominion.

The common Caragor is vicious, disgusting, and a relentless killing machine.
